titles: A true and particular relation of the late victory obtained by Colonel Horton & Colonel Okey, against the VVelsh forces under Major Generall Langhorn expressed in a letter from Colonel Okey to a friend of his in London.
author: Okey, John, d. 1662.
publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons, for Henry Overton ...,
notes: Dated and signed at end: "From the field by St. Fagons this 8. of May, 1648. John Okey."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
